section:
You rise rapidly from being an ordinary sailor to the rank of trusty midshipman. Eventually, after many months, the captain agrees to give you your freedom. ‘You deserve it,’ he says. ‘Where shall I put you ashore? How about Old Sokar?’ You notice he disdains to use its new name, Marlock City.
